title: No Dashii

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You choose someone to kill and someone to roleblock each night.
- You can choose to Tentacle someone once at night, making it so they roleblock people they choose. This lasts forever.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Have the Cult of the Clocktower win the game.
Icon URL: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1183302777733140501/1183315205044850728/Icon_nodashii.png?ex=6587e329&is=65756e29&hm=7b1944d5b283dc1d88d966734cc61572b94b09be2801bb447d96b8512bd71b25&

desc:
Post 4584
*"By the sins of Arnoch, I feel thy laden stench. By the curs-ed sun and her foul legion of tiny grinning gods, I corrupt thee. By the blessed night and the hidden depths of the horrid and unholy sea, I end thy squalid life upon this plane."*
